This game has a solid history as a medium to fast paced shooter with heavy emphasis on head shots and some fun parts like bunny hopping.
Overall nice game to play. I have encountered 1-2 cheaters in the last 5 months.

Great Game, if you think there are cheaters, just play enough to get prime. or even buy prime. Even though it can be tough at the start, you will learn the game and develop skills to get better at aiming in CSGo and even other games.
The game is amazing, but only if you get prime. Otherwise the only thing you're going to feel is depression when entering ANY comp game.
I recommend this game to anyone who has time to learn spray patterns.
